FuncDef(
  decl=

              params[1]=

                  name='grille',

                          dim=

                              type='int',

                        )
                    )
                )
              params[2]=
                Decl(
                  name='hauteur_grille',

                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='hauteur_grille',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,

                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[3]=
                Decl(
                  name='largeur_grille',
                  quals=[],

                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='largeur_grille',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='lab_est_une_sortie',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='x',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='x',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
          init=
            ArrayRef(
              name=
                ID(
                  name='position',
                )
              subscript=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='0',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Decl(
          name='y',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='y',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
          init=
            ArrayRef(
              name=
                ID(
                  name='position',
                )
              subscript=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='1',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='||',
              left=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='||',
                  left=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='||',
                      left=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='==',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='x',
                            )
                          right=

                              value='0',
                            )

                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='x',
                            )
                          right=
                            BinaryOp(
                              op='-',
                              left=
                                ID(
                                  name='hauteur_grille',
                                )
                              right=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='1',
                                )
                            )
                        )

                    BinaryOp(

                      left=
                        ID(

                        )

                        Constant(

                          value='0',
                        )
                    )
                )
              right=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='==',
                  left=
                    ID(
                      name='y',
                    )
                  right=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='-',
                      left=
                        ID(
                          name='largeur_grille',
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='1',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                If(
                  cond=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='!=',
                      left=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ArrayRef(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='grille',
                                )
                              subscript=
                                ID(
                                  name='x',
                                )
                            )
                          subscript=
                            ID(
                              name='y',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='1',
                        )
                    )
                  iftrue=
                    Compound(
                      block_items[0]=
                        Return(
                          expr=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )

                )
            )
        )
      block_items[3]=
        Return(
          expr=
            Constant(
              type='int',
              value='0',
            )

FuncDef(
  decl=

              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['void'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Nom du fichier : "',
                )

        )
      block_items[1]=
        Decl(
          name='nom_fichier',

                    IdentifierType(

                ID(

        )

          args=

          name=

              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Fichier lu : \'%s\'\\n"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                ID(

                )
            )
        )
      block_items[4]=
        FuncCall(

            ExprList(

              exprs[1]=
                ID(
                  name='nom_fichier',
                )
              exprs[2]=
                ID(
                  name='buf_taille',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[5]=
        Assignment(
          op='=',
          lvalue=
            ArrayRef(
              name=
                ID(
                  name='buf_nom_fichier',
                )
              subscript=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='-',
                  left=
                    ID(

                    )
                  right=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='1',
                    )
                )
            )
          rvalue=

              type='char',
              value="'\\0'",

    )
)

                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Decl(
          name='difference_x',
          quals=[],
          align=[],
          storage=[],
          funcspec=[],
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='difference_x',

                  names=['int'],
                )

        )
      block_items[2]=
        Assignment(
          op='=',
          lvalue=
            ID(
              name='difference_x',
            )
          rvalue=
            BinaryOp(

                )

        )

                            Constant(
                              type='int',

                            )

                      right=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='==',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='difference_y',
                            )
                          right=
                            UnaryOp(
                              op='-',
                              expr=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='1',
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
              right=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='&&',
                  left=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        ID(
                          name='difference_y',
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='0',

                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='difference_x',
                            )
                          right=
                            UnaryOp(
                              op='-',
                              expr=
                                Constant(
                                  type='int',
                                  value='1',
                                )
                            )

                    )
